5101  << pretty_binary_string(key) << dendl;
5102 
5103  bufferlist v;
5104  int r = -ENOENT;
5105  Onode *on;
5106  if (!is_createop) {
5107  r = store->db->get(PREFIX_OBJ, key.c_str(), key.size(), &v);
5108  ldout(store->cct, 20) << " r " << r << " v.len " << v.length() << dendl;
5109  }
5110  if (v.length() == 0) {
5111  ceph_assert(r == -ENOENT);
5112  if (!create)
5113  return OnodeRef();
5114  } else {
5115  ceph_assert(r >= 0);
5116  }
5117 
5118  // new object, load onode if available
5119  on = Onode::create_decode(this, oid, key, v, true);
5120  o.reset(on);
5121  return onode_space.add_onode(oid, o);
5122 }
5123 
5124 void BlueStore::Collection::split_cache(
5125  Collection *dest)
5126 {
5127  ldout(store->cct, 10) << __func__ << " to " << dest << dendl;
5128 
5129  auto *ocache = get_onode_cache();
5130  auto *ocache_dest = dest->get_onode_cache();
5131 
5132  // lock cache shards
5133  std::lock(ocache->lock, ocache_dest->lock, cache->lock, dest->cache->lock);
5134  std::lock_guard l(ocache->lock, std::adopt_lock);
5135  std::lock_guard l2(ocache_dest->lock, std::adopt_lock);
5136  std::lock_guard l3(cache->lock, std::adopt_lock);
5137  std::lock_guard l4(dest->cache->lock, std::adopt_lock);
5138 
5139  int destbits = dest->cnode.bits;
5140  spg_t destpg;
5141  bool is_pg = dest->cid.is_pg(&destpg);
5142  ceph_assert(is_pg);
5143 
5144  auto p = onode_space.onode_map.begin();
5145  while (p != onode_space.onode_map.end()) {
5146  OnodeRef o = p->second;
5147  if (!p->second->oid.match(destbits, destpg.pgid.ps())) {
5148  // onode does not belong to this child
5149  ldout(store->cct, 20) << __func__ << " not moving " << o << " " << o->oid
5150  << dendl;
5151  ++p;
5152  } else {
5153  ldout(store->cct, 20) << __func__ << " moving " << o << " " << o->oid
5154  << dendl;
5155 
5156  // ensuring that nref is always >= 2 and hence onode is pinned
5157  OnodeRef o_pin = o;
5158 
5159  p = onode_space.onode_map.erase(p);
5160  dest->onode_space.onode_map[o->oid] = o;
5161  if (o->cached) {
5162  get_onode_cache()->_move_pinned(dest->get_onode_cache(), o.get());
5163  }
5164  o->c = dest;
5165 
5166  // move over shared blobs and buffers. cover shared blobs from
5167  // both extent map and spanning blob map (the full extent map
5168  // may not be faulted in)
5169 
5170  auto rehome_blob = [&](Blob* b) {
5171  for (auto& i : b->bc.buffer_map) {
5172  if (!i.second->is_writing()) {
5173  ldout(store->cct, 1) << __func__ << " moving " << *i.second
5174  << dendl;
5175  dest->cache->_move(cache, i.second.get());
5176  } else {
5177  ldout(store->cct, 1) << __func__ << " not moving " << *i.second
5178  << dendl;
5179  }
5180  }
5181  cache->rm_blob();
5182  dest->cache->add_blob();
5183  SharedBlob* sb = b->shared_blob.get();
5184  if (sb->coll == dest) {
5185  ldout(store->cct, 20) << __func__ << " already moved " << *sb
5186  << dendl;
5187  return;
5188  }
5189  ldout(store->cct, 20) << __func__ << " moving " << *sb << dendl;
5190  if (sb->get_sbid()) {
5191  ldout(store->cct, 20) << __func__
5192  << " moving registration " << *sb << dendl;
5193  shared_blob_set.remove(sb);
5194  dest->shared_blob_set.add(dest, sb);
5195  }
5196  sb->coll = dest;
5197  };
5198 
5199  for (auto& e : o->extent_map.extent_map) {
5200  e.blob->last_encoded_id = -1;
5201  }
5202  for (auto& b : o->extent_map.spanning_blob_map) {
5203  b.second->last_encoded_id = -1;
5204  }
5205  for (auto& e : o->extent_map.extent_map) {
5206  cache->rm_extent();
5207  dest->cache->add_extent();
5208  Blob* tb = e.blob.get();
5209  if (tb->last_encoded_id == -1) {
5210  rehome_blob(tb);
5211  tb->last_encoded_id = 0;
5212  }
5213  }
5214  for (auto& b : o->extent_map.spanning_blob_map) {
5215  Blob* tb = b.second.get();
5216  if (tb->last_encoded_id == -1) {
5217  // Having blob in spanning but not mapped is an error.
5218  // It will be dropped during encode_some(),
5219  // but in the meantime we want cache to be consistent.
5220  ldout(store->cct, 10) << __func__ << " spanning blob not in map " << *tb << dendl;
5221  rehome_blob(tb);
5222  tb->last_encoded_id = 0;
5223  }
5224  }
5225  }
5226  }
5227  dest->cache->_trim();
5228 }
5229 
5230 // =======================================================
5231 
5232 // MempoolThread
5233 
5234 #undef dout_prefix
5235 #define dout_prefix *_dout << "bluestore.MempoolThread(" << this << ") "
5236 #undef dout_context
5237 #define dout_context store->cct
5238 
5239 void *BlueStore::MempoolThread::entry()
5240 {
5241  std::unique_lock l{lock};
5242 
5243  uint32_t prev_config_change = store->config_changed.load();
5244  uint64_t base = store->osd_memory_base;
5245  double fragmentation = store->osd_memory_expected_fragmentation;
5246  uint64_t target = store->osd_memory_target;
5247  uint64_t min = store->osd_memory_cache_min;
5248  uint64_t max = min;
5249 
5250  // When setting the maximum amount of memory to use for cache, first
5251  // assume some base amount of memory for the OSD and then fudge in
5252  // some overhead for fragmentation that scales with cache usage.
5253  uint64_t ltarget = (1.0 - fragmentation) * target;
5254  if (ltarget > base + min) {
5255  max = ltarget - base;
5256  }
5257 
5258  binned_kv_cache = store->db->get_priority_cache();
5259  binned_kv_onode_cache = store->db->get_priority_cache(PREFIX_OBJ);
5260  if (store->cache_autotune && binned_kv_cache != nullptr) {
5261  pcm = std::make_shared<PriorityCache::Manager>(
5262  store->cct, min, max, target, true, "bluestore-pricache");
5263  pcm->insert("kv", binned_kv_cache, true);
5264  pcm->insert("meta", meta_cache, true);
5265  pcm->insert("data", data_cache, true);
5266  if (binned_kv_onode_cache != nullptr) {
5267  pcm->insert("kv_onode", binned_kv_onode_cache, true);
5268  }
5269  }
5270 
5271  utime_t next_balance = ceph_clock_now();
5272  utime_t next_resize = ceph_clock_now();
5273  utime_t next_bin_rotation = ceph_clock_now();
5274  utime_t next_deferred_force_submit = ceph_clock_now();
5275  utime_t alloc_stats_dump_clock = ceph_clock_now();
5276 
5277  bool interval_stats_trim = false;
5278  while (!stop) {
5279  // Update pcm cache settings if related configuration was changed
5280  uint32_t cur_config_change = store->config_changed.load();
5281  if (cur_config_change != prev_config_change) {
5282  _update_cache_settings();
5283  prev_config_change = cur_config_change;
5284  }
5285 
5286  // define various intervals for background work
5287  double age_bin_interval = store->cache_age_bin_interval;
5288  double autotune_interval = store->cache_autotune_interval;
5289  double resize_interval = store->osd_memory_cache_resize_interval;
5290  double max_defer_interval = store->max_defer_interval;
5291  double alloc_stats_dump_interval =
5292  store->cct->_conf->bluestore_alloc_stats_dump_interval;
5293 
5294  // alloc stats dump
5295  if (alloc_stats_dump_interval > 0 &&
5296  alloc_stats_dump_clock + alloc_stats_dump_interval < ceph_clock_now()) {
5297  store->_record_allocation_stats();
5298  alloc_stats_dump_clock = ceph_clock_now();
5299  }
5300  // cache age binning
5301  if (age_bin_interval > 0 && next_bin_rotation < ceph_clock_now()) {
5302  if (binned_kv_cache != nullptr) {
5303  binned_kv_cache->import_bins(store->kv_bins);
5304  }
5305  if (binned_kv_onode_cache != nullptr) {
5306  binned_kv_onode_cache->import_bins(store->kv_onode_bins);
5307  }
5308  meta_cache->import_bins(store->meta_bins);
5309  data_cache->import_bins(store->data_bins);
5310 
5311  if (pcm != nullptr) {
5312  pcm->shift_bins();
5313  }
5314  next_bin_rotation = ceph_clock_now();
5315  next_bin_rotation += age_bin_interval;
5316  }
5317  // cache balancing
5318  if (autotune_interval > 0 && next_balance < ceph_clock_now()) {
5319  if (binned_kv_cache != nullptr) {
5320  binned_kv_cache->set_cache_ratio(store->cache_kv_ratio);
5321  }
5322  if (binned_kv_onode_cache != nullptr) {
5323  binned_kv_onode_cache->set_cache_ratio(store->cache_kv_onode_ratio);
5324  }
5325  meta_cache->set_cache_ratio(store->cache_meta_ratio);
5326  data_cache->set_cache_ratio(store->cache_data_ratio);
5327 
5328  // Log events at 5 instead of 20 when balance happens.
5329  interval_stats_trim = true;
5330 
5331  if (pcm != nullptr) {
5332  pcm->balance();
5333  }
5334 
5335  next_balance = ceph_clock_now();
5336  next_balance += autotune_interval;
5337  }
5338  // memory resizing (ie autotuning)
5339  if (resize_interval > 0 && next_resize < ceph_clock_now()) {
5340  if (ceph_using_tcmalloc() && pcm != nullptr) {
5341  pcm->tune_memory();
5342  }
5343  next_resize = ceph_clock_now();
5344  next_resize += resize_interval;
5345  }
5346  // deferred force submit
5347  if (max_defer_interval > 0 &&
5348  next_deferred_force_submit < ceph_clock_now()) {
5349  if (store->get_deferred_last_submitted() + max_defer_interval <
5350  ceph_clock_now()) {
5351  store->deferred_try_submit();
5352  }
5353  next_deferred_force_submit = ceph_clock_now();
5354  next_deferred_force_submit += max_defer_interval/3;
5355  }
5356 
5357  // Now Resize the shards
5358  _resize_shards(interval_stats_trim);
5359  interval_stats_trim = false;
5360 
5361  store->_update_logger();
5362  auto wait = ceph::make_timespan(
5363  store->cct->_conf->bluestore_cache_trim_interval);
5364  cond.wait_for(l, wait);
5365  }
5366  // do final dump
5367  store->_record_allocation_stats();
5368  stop = false;
5369  pcm = nullptr;
5370  return NULL;
5371 }
5372 
5373 void BlueStore::MempoolThread::_resize_shards(bool interval_stats)
5374 {
5375  size_t onode_shards = store->onode_cache_shards.size();
5376  size_t buffer_shards = store->buffer_cache_shards.size();
5377  int64_t kv_used = store->db->get_cache_usage();
5378  int64_t kv_onode_used = store->db->get_cache_usage(PREFIX_OBJ);
5379  int64_t meta_used = meta_cache->_get_used_bytes();
5380  int64_t data_used = data_cache->_get_used_bytes();
5381 
5382  uint64_t cache_size = store->cache_size;
5383  int64_t kv_alloc =
5384  static_cast<int64_t>(store->cache_kv_ratio * cache_size);
5385  int64_t kv_onode_alloc =
5386  static_cast<int64_t>(store->cache_kv_onode_ratio * cache_size);
5387  int64_t meta_alloc =
5388  static_cast<int64_t>(store->cache_meta_ratio * cache_size);
5389  int64_t data_alloc =
5390  static_cast<int64_t>(store->cache_data_ratio * cache_size);
5391 
5392  if (pcm != nullptr && binned_kv_cache != nullptr) {
5393  cache_size = pcm->get_tuned_mem();
5394  kv_alloc = binned_kv_cache->get_committed_size();
5395  meta_alloc = meta_cache->get_committed_size();
5396  data_alloc = data_cache->get_committed_size();
5397  if (binned_kv_onode_cache != nullptr) {
5398  kv_onode_alloc = binned_kv_onode_cache->get_committed_size();
5399  }
5400  }
5401 
5402  if (interval_stats) {
5403  dout(5) << __func__ << " cache_size: " << cache_size
5404  << " kv_alloc: " << kv_alloc
5405  << " kv_used: " << kv_used
5406  << " kv_onode_alloc: " << kv_onode_alloc
5407  << " kv_onode_used: " << kv_onode_used
5408  << " meta_alloc: " << meta_alloc
5409  << " meta_used: " << meta_used
5410  << " data_alloc: " << data_alloc
5411  << " data_used: " << data_used << dendl;
5412  } else {
5413  dout(20) << __func__ << " cache_size: " << cache_size
5414  << " kv_alloc: " << kv_alloc
5415  << " kv_used: " << kv_used
5416  << " kv_onode_alloc: " << kv_onode_alloc
5417  << " kv_onode_used: " << kv_onode_used
5418  << " meta_alloc: " << meta_alloc
5419  << " meta_used: " << meta_used
5420  << " data_alloc: " << data_alloc
5421  << " data_used: " << data_used << dendl;
5422  }
5423 
5424  uint64_t max_shard_onodes = static_cast<uint64_t>(
5425  (meta_alloc / (double) onode_shards) / meta_cache->get_bytes_per_onode());
5426  uint64_t max_shard_buffer = static_cast<uint64_t>(data_alloc / buffer_shards);
5427 
5428  dout(30) << __func__ << " max_shard_onodes: " << max_shard_onodes
5429  << " max_shard_buffer: " << max_shard_buffer << dendl;
5430 
5431  for (auto i : store->onode_cache_shards) {
5432  i->set_max(max_shard_onodes);
5433  }
5434  for (auto i : store->buffer_cache_shards) {
5435  i->set_max(max_shard_buffer);
5436  }
5437 }
5438 
5439 void BlueStore::MempoolThread::_update_cache_settings()
5440 {
5441  // Nothing to do if pcm is not used.
5442  if (pcm == nullptr) {
5443  return;
5444  }
5445 
5446  uint64_t target = store->osd_memory_target;
5447  uint64_t base = store->osd_memory_base;
5448  uint64_t min = store->osd_memory_cache_min;
5449  uint64_t max = min;
5450  double fragmentation = store->osd_memory_expected_fragmentation;
5451 
5452  uint64_t ltarget = (1.0 - fragmentation) * target;
5453  if (ltarget > base + min) {
5454  max = ltarget - base;
5455  }
5456 
5457  // set pcm cache levels
5458  pcm->set_target_memory(target);
5459  pcm->set_min_memory(min);
5460  pcm->set_max_memory(max);
5461 
5462  dout(5) << __func__ << " updated pcm target: " << target
5463  << " pcm min: " << min
5464  << " pcm max: " << max
5465  << dendl;
5466 }
5467 
5468 // =======================================================
5469 
5470 // OmapIteratorImpl
5471 
5472 #undef dout_prefix
5473 #define dout_prefix *_dout << "bluestore.OmapIteratorImpl(" << this << ") "
5474 
5475 BlueStore::OmapIteratorImpl::OmapIteratorImpl(
5476  PerfCounters* _logger, CollectionRef c, OnodeRef& o, KeyValueDB::Iterator it)
5477  : logger(_logger), c(c), o(o), it(it)
5478 {
5479  logger->inc(l_bluestore_omap_iterator_count);
5480  std::shared_lock l(c->lock);
5481  if (o->onode.has_omap()) {
5482  o->get_omap_key(string(), &head);
5483  o->get_omap_tail(&tail);
5484  it->lower_bound(head);
5485  }
5486 }
5487 BlueStore::OmapIteratorImpl::~OmapIteratorImpl()
5488 {
5489  logger->dec(l_bluestore_omap_iterator_count);
5490 }
5491 
5492 string BlueStore::OmapIteratorImpl::_stringify() const
5493 {
5494  stringstream s;
5495  s << " omap_iterator(cid = " << c->cid
5496  <<", oid = " << o->oid << ")";
5497  return s.str();
5498 }
5499 
5500 int BlueStore::OmapIteratorImpl::seek_to_first()
5501 {
5502  std::shared_lock l(c->lock);
5503  auto start1 = mono_clock::now();
5504  if (o->onode.has_omap()) {
5505  it->lower_bound(head);
5506  } else {
5507  it = KeyValueDB::Iterator();
5508  }
5509  c->store->log_latency(
5510  __func__,
5511  l_bluestore_omap_seek_to_first_lat,
5512  mono_clock::now() - start1,
5513  c->store->cct->_conf->bluestore_log_omap_iterator_age);
5514 
5515  return 0;
5516 }
5517 
5518 int BlueStore::OmapIteratorImpl::upper_bound(const string& after)
5519 {
5520  std::shared_lock l(c->lock);
5521  auto start1 = mono_clock::now();
5522  if (o->onode.has_omap()) {
5523  string key;
5524  o->get_omap_key(after, &key);
5525  ldout(c->store->cct,20) << __func__ << " after " << after << " key "
5526  << pretty_binary_string(key) << dendl;
5527  it->upper_bound(key);
5528  } else {
5529  it = KeyValueDB::Iterator();
5530  }
5531  c->store->log_latency_fn(
5532  __func__,
5533  l_bluestore_omap_upper_bound_lat,
5534  mono_clock::now() - start1,
5535  c->store->cct->_conf->bluestore_log_omap_iterator_age,
5536  [&] (const ceph::timespan& lat) {
5537  return ", after = " + after +
5538  _stringify();
5539  }
5540  );
5541  return 0;
5542 }
5543 
5544 int BlueStore::OmapIteratorImpl::lower_bound(const string& to)
5545 {
5546  std::shared_lock l(c->lock);
5547  auto start1 = mono_clock::now();
5548  if (o->onode.has_omap()) {
5549  string key;
5550  o->get_omap_key(to, &key);
5551  ldout(c->store->cct,20) << __func__ << " to " << to << " key "
5552  << pretty_binary_string(key) << dendl;
5553  it->lower_bound(key);
5554  } else {
5555  it = KeyValueDB::Iterator();
5556  }
5557  c->store->log_latency_fn(
5558  __func__,
5559  l_bluestore_omap_lower_bound_lat,
5560  mono_clock::now() - start1,
5561  c->store->cct->_conf->bluestore_log_omap_iterator_age,
5562  [&] (const ceph::timespan& lat) {
5563  return ", to = " + to +
5564  _stringify();
5565  }
5566  );
5567  return 0;
5568 }
5569 
5570 bool BlueStore::OmapIteratorImpl::valid()
5571 {
5572  std::shared_lock l(c->lock);
5573  bool r = o->onode.has_omap() && it && it->valid() &&
5574  it->raw_key().second < tail;
5575  if (it && it->valid()) {
5576  ldout(c->store->cct,20) << __func__ << " is at "
5577  << pretty_binary_string(it->raw_key().second)
5578  << dendl;
5579  }
5580  return r;
5581 }
5582 
5583 int BlueStore::OmapIteratorImpl::next()
5584 {
5585  int r = -1;
5586  std::shared_lock l(c->lock);
5587  auto start1 = mono_clock::now();
5588  if (o->onode.has_omap()) {
5589  it->next();
5590  r = 0;
5591  }
5592  c->store->log_latency(
5593  __func__,
5594  l_bluestore_omap_next_lat,
5595  mono_clock::now() - start1,
5596  c->store->cct->_conf->bluestore_log_omap_iterator_age);
5597 
5598  return r;
5599 }
5600 
5601 string BlueStore::OmapIteratorImpl::key()
5602 {
5603  std::shared_lock l(c->lock);
5604  ceph_assert(it->valid());
5605  string db_key = it->raw_key().second;
5606  string user_key;
5607  o->decode_omap_key(db_key, &user_key);
5608 
5609  return user_key;
5610 }
5611 
5612 bufferlist BlueStore::OmapIteratorImpl::value()
5613 {
5614  std::shared_lock l(c->lock);
5615  ceph_assert(it->valid());
5616  return it->value();
5617 }
5618 
5619 
5620 // =====================================
5621 
5622 #undef dout_prefix
5623 #define dout_prefix *_dout << "bluestore(" << path << ") "
5624 #undef dout_context
5625 #define dout_context cct
5626 
5627 
5628 static void aio_cb(void *priv, void *priv2)
5629 {
5630  BlueStore *store = static_cast<BlueStore*>(priv);
5631  BlueStore::AioContext *c = static_cast<BlueStore::AioContext*>(priv2);
5632  c->aio_finish(store);
5633 }
5634 
5635 static void discard_cb(void *priv, void *priv2)
5636 {
5637  BlueStore *store = static_cast<BlueStore*>(priv);
5638  interval_set<uint64_t> *tmp = static_cast<interval_set<uint64_t>*>(priv2);
5639  store->handle_discard(*tmp);
5640 }
5641 
5642 void BlueStore::handle_discard(interval_set<uint64_t>& to_release)
5643 {
5644  dout(10) << __func__ << dendl;
5645  ceph_assert(alloc);
5646  alloc->release(to_release);
5647 }
5648 
5649 BlueStore::BlueStore(CephContext *cct, const string& path)
5650  : BlueStore(cct, path, 0) {}
5651 
5652 BlueStore::BlueStore(CephContext *cct,
5653  const string& path,
5654  uint64_t _min_alloc_size)
5655  : ObjectStore(cct, path),
5656  throttle(cct),
5657  finisher(cct, "commit_finisher", "cfin"),
5658  kv_sync_thread(this),
5659  kv_finalize_thread(this),
5660 #ifdef HAVE_LIBZBD
5661  zoned_cleaner_thread(this),
5662 #endif
5663  min_alloc_size(_min_alloc_size),
5664  min_alloc_size_order(std::countr_zero(_min_alloc_size)),
5665  mempool_thread(this)
5666 {
5667  _init_logger();
5668  cct->_conf.add_observer(this);
5669  set_cache_shards(1);
5670 }
5671 
5672 BlueStore::~BlueStore()
5673 {
5674  cct->_conf.remove_observer(this);
5675  _shutdown_logger();
5676  ceph_assert(!mounted);
5677  ceph_assert(db == NULL);
5678  ceph_assert(bluefs == NULL);
5679  ceph_assert(fsid_fd < 0);
5680  ceph_assert(path_fd < 0);
5681  for (auto i : onode_cache_shards) {
5682  delete i;
5683  }
5684  for (auto i : buffer_cache_shards) {
5685  delete i;
5686  }
5687  onode_cache_shards.clear();
5688  buffer_cache_shards.clear();
5689 }
5690 
5691 const char **BlueStore::get_tracked_conf_keys() const
5692 {
5693  static const char* KEYS[] = {
5694  "bluestore_csum_type",
5695  "bluestore_compression_mode",
5696  "bluestore_compression_algorithm",
5697  "bluestore_compression_min_blob_size",
5698  "bluestore_compression_min_blob_size_ssd",
5699  "bluestore_compression_min_blob_size_hdd",
5700  "bluestore_compression_max_blob_size",
5701  "bluestore_compression_max_blob_size_ssd",
5702  "bluestore_compression_max_blob_size_hdd",
5703  "bluestore_compression_required_ratio",
5704  "bluestore_max_alloc_size",
5705  "bluestore_prefer_deferred_size",
5706  "bluestore_prefer_deferred_size_hdd",
5707  "bluestore_prefer_deferred_size_ssd",
5708  "bluestore_deferred_batch_ops",
5709  "bluestore_deferred_batch_ops_hdd",
5710  "bluestore_deferred_batch_ops_ssd",
5711  "bluestore_throttle_bytes",
5712  "bluestore_throttle_deferred_bytes",
5713  "bluestore_throttle_cost_per_io_hdd",
5714  "bluestore_throttle_cost_per_io_ssd",
5715  "bluestore_throttle_cost_per_io",
5716  "bluestore_max_blob_size",
5717  "bluestore_max_blob_size_ssd",
5718  "bluestore_max_blob_size_hdd",
5719  "osd_memory_target",
5720  "osd_memory_target_cgroup_limit_ratio",
5721  "osd_memory_base",
5722  "osd_memory_cache_min",
5723  "osd_memory_expected_fragmentation",
5724  "bluestore_cache_autotune",
5725  "bluestore_cache_autotune_interval",
5726  "bluestore_cache_age_bin_interval",
5727  "bluestore_cache_kv_age_bins",
5728  "bluestore_cache_kv_onode_age_bins",
5729  "bluestore_cache_meta_age_bins",
5730  "bluestore_cache_data_age_bins",
5731  "bluestore_warn_on_legacy_statfs",
5732  "bluestore_warn_on_no_per_pool_omap",
5733  "bluestore_warn_on_no_per_pg_omap",
5734  "bluestore_max_defer_interval",
5735  NULL
5736  };
5737  return KEYS;
5738 }
5739 
5740 void BlueStore::handle_conf_change(const ConfigProxy& conf,
5741  const std::set<std::string> &changed)
5742 {
5743  if (changed.count("bluestore_warn_on_legacy_statfs")) {
5744  _check_legacy_statfs_alert();
5745  }
5746  if (changed.count("bluestore_warn_on_no_per_pool_omap") ||
5747  changed.count("bluestore_warn_on_no_per_pg_omap")) {
5748  _check_no_per_pg_or_pool_omap_alert();
5749  }
5750 
5751  if (changed.count("bluestore_csum_type")) {
5752  _set_csum();
5753  }
5754  if (changed.count("bluestore_compression_mode") ||
5755  changed.count("bluestore_compression_algorithm") ||
5756  changed.count("bluestore_compression_min_blob_size") ||
5757  changed.count("bluestore_compression_max_blob_size")) {
5758  if (bdev) {
5759  _set_compression();
5760  }
5761  }
5762  if (changed.count("bluestore_max_blob_size") ||
5763  changed.count("bluestore_max_blob_size_ssd") ||
5764  changed.count("bluestore_max_blob_size_hdd")) {
5765  if (bdev) {
5766  // only after startup
5767  _set_blob_size();
5768  }
5769  }
5770  if (changed.count("bluestore_prefer_deferred_size") ||
5771  changed.count("bluestore_prefer_deferred_size_hdd") ||
5772  changed.count("bluestore_prefer_deferred_size_ssd") ||
5773  changed.count("bluestore_max_alloc_size") ||
5774  changed.count("bluestore_deferred_batch_ops") ||
5775  changed.count("bluestore_deferred_batch_ops_hdd") ||
5776  changed.count("bluestore_deferred_batch_ops_ssd")) {
5777  if (bdev) {
5778  // only after startup
5779  _set_alloc_sizes();
5780  }
5781  }
5782  if (changed.count("bluestore_throttle_cost_per_io") ||
5783  changed.count("bluestore_throttle_cost_per_io_hdd") ||
5784  changed.count("bluestore_throttle_cost_per_io_ssd")) {
5785  if (bdev) {
5786  _set_throttle_params();
5787  }
5788  }
5789  if (changed.count("bluestore_throttle_bytes") ||
5790  changed.count("bluestore_throttle_deferred_bytes") ||
5791  changed.count("bluestore_throttle_trace_rate")) {
5792  throttle.reset_throttle(conf);
5793  }
5794  if (changed.count("bluestore_max_defer_interval")) {
5795  if (bdev) {
5796  _set_max_defer_interval();
5797  }
5798  }
5799  if (changed.count("osd_memory_target") ||
5800  changed.count("osd_memory_base") ||
5801  changed.count("osd_memory_cache_min") ||
5802  changed.count("osd_memory_expected_fragmentation")) {
5803  _update_osd_memory_options();
5804  }
5805 }
5806 
5807 void BlueStore::_set_compression()
5808 {
5809  auto m = Compressor::get_comp_mode_type(cct->_conf->bluestore_compression_mode);
5810  if (m) {
5811  _clear_compression_alert();
5812  comp_mode = *m;
5813  } else {
5814  derr << __func__ << " unrecognized value '"
5815  << cct->_conf->bluestore_compression_mode
5816  << "' for bluestore_compression_mode, reverting to 'none'"
5817  << dendl;
5818  comp_mode = Compressor::COMP_NONE;
5819  string s("unknown mode: ");
5820  s += cct->_conf->bluestore_compression_mode;
5821  _set_compression_alert(true, s.c_str());
5822  }
5823 
5824  compressor = nullptr;
5825 
5826  if (cct->_conf->bluestore_compression_min_blob_size) {
5827  comp_min_blob_size = cct->_conf->bluestore_compression_min_blob_size;
5828  } else {
5829  ceph_assert(bdev);
5830  if (_use_rotational_settings()) {
5831  comp_min_blob_size = cct->_conf->bluestore_compression_min_blob_size_hdd;
5832  } else {
5833  comp_min_blob_size = cct->_conf->bluestore_compression_min_blob_size_ssd;
5834  }
5835  }
5836 
5837  if (cct->_conf->bluestore_compression_max_blob_size) {
5838  comp_max_blob_size = cct->_conf->bluestore_compression_max_blob_size;
5839  } else {
5840  ceph_assert(bdev);
5841  if (_use_rotational_settings()) {
5842  comp_max_blob_size = cct->_conf->bluestore_compression_max_blob_size_hdd;
5843  } else {
5844  comp_max_blob_size = cct->_conf->bluestore_compression_max_blob_size_ssd;
5845  }
5846  }
5847 
5848  auto& alg_name = cct->_conf->bluestore_compression_algorithm;
5849  if (!alg_name.empty()) {
5850  compressor = Compressor::create(cct, alg_name);
5851  if (!compressor) {
5852  derr << __func__ << " unable to initialize " << alg_name.c_str() << " compressor"
5853  << dendl;
5854  _set_compression_alert(false, alg_name.c_str());
5855  }
5856  }
5857 
5858  dout(10) << __func__ << " mode " << Compressor::get_comp_mode_name(comp_mode)
5859  << " alg " << (compressor ? compressor->get_type_name() : "(none)")
5860  << " min_blob " << comp_min_blob_size
5861  << " max_blob " << comp_max_blob_size
5862  << dendl;
5863 }
5864 
5865 void BlueStore::_set_csum()
5866 {
5867  csum_type = Checksummer::CSUM_NONE;
5868  int t = Checksummer::get_csum_string_type(cct->_conf->bluestore_csum_type);
5869  if (t > Checksummer::CSUM_NONE)
5870  csum_type = t;
5871 
5872  dout(10) << __func__ << " csum_type "
5873  << Checksummer::get_csum_type_string(csum_type)
5874  << dendl;
5875 }
5876 
5877 void BlueStore::_set_throttle_params()
5878 {
5879  if (cct->_conf->bluestore_throttle_cost_per_io) {
5880  throttle_cost_per_io = cct->_conf->bluestore_throttle_cost_per_io;
5881  } else {
5882  ceph_assert(bdev);
5883  if (_use_rotational_settings()) {
5884  throttle_cost_per_io = cct->_conf->bluestore_throttle_cost_per_io_hdd;
5885  } else {
5886  throttle_cost_per_io = cct->_conf->bluestore_throttle_cost_per_io_ssd;
5887  }
5888  }
5889 
5890  dout(10) << __func__ << " throttle_cost_per_io " << throttle_cost_per_io
5891  << dendl;
5892 }
5893 void BlueStore::_set_blob_size()
5894 {
5895  if (cct->_conf->bluestore_max_blob_size) {
5896  max_blob_size = cct->_conf->bluestore_max_blob_size;
5897  } else {
5898  ceph_assert(bdev);
5899  if (_use_rotational_settings()) {
5900  max_blob_size = cct->_conf->bluestore_max_blob_size_hdd;
5901  } else {
5902  max_blob_size = cct->_conf->bluestore_max_blob_size_ssd;
5903  }
5904  }
5905  dout(10) << __func__ << " max_blob_size 0x" << std::hex << max_blob_size
5906  << std::dec << dendl;
5907 }
5908 
5909 void BlueStore::_update_osd_memory_options()
5910 {
5911  osd_memory_target = cct->_conf.get_val<Option::size_t>("osd_memory_target");
5912  osd_memory_base = cct->_conf.get_val<Option::size_t>("osd_memory_base");
5913  osd_memory_expected_fragmentation = cct->_conf.get_val<double>("osd_memory_expected_fragmentation");
5914  osd_memory_cache_min = cct->_conf.get_val<Option::size_t>("osd_memory_cache_min");
5915  config_changed++;
5916  dout(10) << __func__
5917  << " osd_memory_target " << osd_memory_target
5918  << " osd_memory_base " << osd_memory_base
5919  << " osd_memory_expected_fragmentation " << osd_memory_expected_fragmentation
5920  << " osd_memory_cache_min " << osd_memory_cache_min
5921  << dendl;
5922 }
5923 
5924 int BlueStore::_set_cache_sizes()
5925 {
5926  ceph_assert(bdev);
5927  cache_autotune = cct->_conf.get_val<bool>("bluestore_cache_autotune");
5928  cache_autotune_interval =
5929  cct->_conf.get_val<double>("bluestore_cache_autotune_interval");
5930  cache_age_bin_interval =
5931  cct->_conf.get_val<double>("bluestore_cache_age_bin_interval");
5932  auto _set_bin = [&](std::string conf_name, std::vector<uint64_t>* intervals)
5933  {
5934  std::string intervals_str = cct->_conf.get_val<std::string>(conf_name);
5935  std::istringstream interval_stream(intervals_str);
5936  std::copy(
5937  std::istream_iterator<uint64_t>(interval_stream),
5938  std::istream_iterator<uint64_t>(),
5939  std::back_inserter(*intervals));
5940  };
5941  _set_bin("bluestore_cache_age_bins_kv", &kv_bins);
5942  _set_bin("bluestore_cache_age_bins_kv_onode", &kv_onode_bins);
5943  _set_bin("bluestore_cache_age_bins_meta", &meta_bins);
5944  _set_bin("bluestore_cache_age_bins_data", &data_bins);
5945 
5946  osd_memory_target = cct->_conf.get_val<Option::size_t>("osd_memory_target");
5947  osd_memory_base = cct->_conf.get_val<Option::size_t>("osd_memory_base");
5948  osd_memory_expected_fragmentation =
5949  cct->_conf.get_val<double>("osd_memory_expected_fragmentation");
5950  osd_memory_cache_min = cct->_conf.get_val<Option::size_t>("osd_memory_cache_min");
5951  osd_memory_cache_resize_interval =
5952  cct->_conf.get_val<double>("osd_memory_cache_resize_interval");
5953 
5954  if (cct->_conf->bluestore_cache_size) {
5955  cache_size = cct->_conf->bluestore_cache_size;
5956  } else {
5957  // choose global cache size based on backend type
5958  if (_use_rotational_settings()) {
5959  cache_size = cct->_conf->bluestore_cache_size_hdd;
5960  } else {
5961  cache_size = cct->_conf->bluestore_cache_size_ssd;
5962  }
5963  }
5964 
5965  cache_meta_ratio = cct->_conf.get_val<double>("bluestore_cache_meta_ratio");
5966  if (cache_meta_ratio < 0 || cache_meta_ratio > 1.0) {
5967  derr << __func__ << " bluestore_cache_meta_ratio (" << cache_meta_ratio
5968  << ") must be in range [0,1.0]" << dendl;
5969  return -EINVAL;
5970  }
5971 
5972  cache_kv_ratio = cct->_conf.get_val<double>("bluestore_cache_kv_ratio");
5973  if (cache_kv_ratio < 0 || cache_kv_ratio > 1.0) {
5974  derr << __func__ << " bluestore_cache_kv_ratio (" << cache_kv_ratio
5975  << ") must be in range [0,1.0]" << dendl;
5976  return -EINVAL;
5977  }
5978 
5979  cache_kv_onode_ratio = cct->_conf.get_val<double>("bluestore_cache_kv_onode_ratio");
5980  if (cache_kv_onode_ratio < 0 || cache_kv_onode_ratio > 1.0) {
5981  derr << __func__ << " bluestore_cache_kv_onode_ratio (" << cache_kv_onode_ratio
5982  << ") must be in range [0,1.0]" << dendl;
5983  return -EINVAL;
5984  }
5985 
5986  if (cache_meta_ratio + cache_kv_ratio + cache_kv_onode_ratio > 1.0) {
5987  derr << __func__ << " bluestore_cache_meta_ratio (" << cache_meta_ratio
5988  << ") + bluestore_cache_kv_ratio (" << cache_kv_ratio
5989  << ") + bluestore_cache_kv_onode_ratio (" << cache_kv_onode_ratio
5990  << ") = " << cache_meta_ratio + cache_kv_ratio + cache_kv_onode_ratio << "; must be <= 1.0"
5991  << dendl;
5992  return -EINVAL;
5993  }
5994 
5995  cache_data_ratio = (double)1.0 -
5996  (double)cache_meta_ratio -
5997  (double)cache_kv_ratio -
5998  (double)cache_kv_onode_ratio;
5999  if (cache_data_ratio < 0) {
6000  // deal with floating point imprecision
6001  cache_data_ratio = 0;
6002  }
6003 
6004  dout(1) << __func__ << " cache_size " << cache_size
6005  << " meta " << cache_meta_ratio
6006  << " kv " << cache_kv_ratio
6007  << " kv_onode " << cache_kv_onode_ratio
6008  << " data " << cache_data_ratio
6009  << dendl;
6010  return 0;
6011 }
6012 
6013 int BlueStore::write_meta(const std::string& key, const std::string& value)
6014 {
6015  bluestore_bdev_label_t label;
6016  string p = path + "/block";
6017  int r = _read_bdev_label(cct, p, &label);
6018  if (r < 0) {
6019  return ObjectStore::write_meta(key, value);
6020  }
6021  label.meta[key] = value;
6022  r = _write_bdev_label(cct, p, label);
6023  ceph_assert(r == 0);
6024  return ObjectStore::write_meta(key, value);
6025 }
6026 
6027 int BlueStore::read_meta(const std::string& key, std::string *value)
6028 {
6029  bluestore_bdev_label_t label;
6030  string p = path + "/block";
6031  int r = _read_bdev_label(cct, p, &label);
6032  if (r < 0) {
6033  return ObjectStore::read_meta(key, value);
6034  }
6035  auto i = label.meta.find(key);
6036  if (i == label.meta.end()) {
6037  return ObjectStore::read_meta(key, value);
6038  }
6039  *value = i->second;
6040  return 0;
6041 }
6042 
6043 
6044 // Reads configuration.
6045 // Validates values.
6046 //
6047 // In future this should be the only place that reads meta,
6048 // except initialization of components, like BlueFS, FreeListManager
6049 //
6050 // NOTE: Any configuration settings that affect data layout on disk
6051 // must be persisted to meta.
6052 int BlueStore::read_meta_conf_check_env()
6053 {
6054  int r = 0;
6055  std::string esb;
6056  r = read_meta("elastic_shared_blobs",&esb);
6057  if (r == 0) {
6058  if (esb != "1" && esb != "0") {
6059  derr << __func__ << " wrong meta.elastic_shared_blobs=" << esb << dendl;
6060  r = -EIO;
6061  } else {
6062  elastic_shared_blobs = esb == "1";
6063  }
6064  } else {
6065  if (r == -ENOENT) {
6066  dout(1) << __func__ << " meta.elastic_shared_blobs not set, using legacy mode" << dendl;
6067  elastic_shared_blobs = false;
6068  r = 0;
6069  }
6070  }
6071  return r;
6072 }
6073 
6074 
6075 void BlueStore::_init_logger()
6076 {
6077  PerfCountersBuilder b(cct, "bluestore",
6078  l_bluestore_first, l_bluestore_last);
6079 
6080  // space utilization stats
6081  //****************************************
6082  b.add_u64(l_bluestore_allocated, "allocated",
6083  "Sum for allocated bytes",
6084  "al_b",
6085  PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_CRITICAL,
6086  unit_t(UNIT_BYTES));
6087  b.add_u64(l_bluestore_stored, "stored",
6088  "Sum for stored bytes",
6089  "st_b",
6090  PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_CRITICAL,
6091  unit_t(UNIT_BYTES));
6092  b.add_u64(l_bluestore_fragmentation, "fragmentation_micros",
6093  "How fragmented bluestore free space is (free extents / max possible number of free extents) * 1000",
6094  "fbss",
6095  PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6096  b.add_u64(l_bluestore_alloc_unit, "alloc_unit",
6097  "allocation unit size in bytes",
6098  "au_b",
6099  PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_CRITICAL,
6100  unit_t(UNIT_BYTES));
6101  //****************************************
6102 
6103  // Update op processing state latencies
6104  //****************************************
6105  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_state_prepare_lat, "state_prepare_lat",
6106  "Average prepare state latency",
6107  "sprl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6108  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_state_aio_wait_lat, "state_aio_wait_lat",
6109  "Average aio_wait state latency",
6110  "sawl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_INTERESTING);
6111  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_state_io_done_lat, "state_io_done_lat",
6112  "Average io_done state latency",
6113  "sidl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6114  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_state_kv_queued_lat, "state_kv_queued_lat",
6115  "Average kv_queued state latency",
6116  "skql", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6117  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_state_kv_committing_lat, "state_kv_commiting_lat",
6118  "Average kv_commiting state latency",
6119  "skcl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6120  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_state_kv_done_lat, "state_kv_done_lat",
6121  "Average kv_done state latency",
6122  "skdl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6123  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_state_finishing_lat, "state_finishing_lat",
6124  "Average finishing state latency",
6125  "sfnl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6126  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_state_done_lat, "state_done_lat",
6127  "Average done state latency",
6128  "sdnl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6129  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_state_deferred_queued_lat, "state_deferred_queued_lat",
6130  "Average deferred_queued state latency",
6131  "sdql", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6132  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_state_deferred_aio_wait_lat, "state_deferred_aio_wait_lat",
6133  "Average aio_wait state latency",
6134  "sdal", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6135  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_state_deferred_cleanup_lat, "state_deferred_cleanup_lat",
6136  "Average cleanup state latency",
6137  "sdcl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6138  //****************************************
6139 
6140  // Update Transaction stats
6141  //****************************************
6142  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_throttle_lat, "txc_throttle_lat",
6143  "Average submit throttle latency",
6144  "th_l", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_CRITICAL);
6145  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_submit_lat, "txc_submit_lat",
6146  "Average submit latency",
6147  "s_l", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_CRITICAL);
6148  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_commit_lat, "txc_commit_lat",
6149  "Average commit latency",
6150  "c_l", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_CRITICAL);
6151  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_txc, "txc_count", "Transactions committed");
6152  //****************************************
6153 
6154  // Read op stats
6155  //****************************************
6156  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_read_onode_meta_lat, "read_onode_meta_lat",
6157  "Average read onode metadata latency",
6158  "roml", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6159  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_read_wait_aio_lat, "read_wait_aio_lat",
6160  "Average read I/O waiting latency",
6161  "rwal", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6162  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_csum_lat, "csum_lat",
6163  "Average checksum latency",
6164  "csml", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6165  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_read_eio, "read_eio",
6166  "Read EIO errors propagated to high level callers");
6167  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_reads_with_retries, "reads_with_retries",
6168  "Read operations that required at least one retry due to failed checksum validation",
6169  "rd_r", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6170  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_read_lat, "read_lat",
6171  "Average read latency",
6172  "r_l", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_CRITICAL);
6173  //****************************************
6174 
6175  // kv_thread latencies
6176  //****************************************
6177  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_kv_flush_lat, "kv_flush_lat",
6178  "Average kv_thread flush latency",
6179  "kfsl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_INTERESTING);
6180  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_kv_commit_lat, "kv_commit_lat",
6181  "Average kv_thread commit latency",
6182  "kcol", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6183  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_kv_sync_lat, "kv_sync_lat",
6184  "Average kv_sync thread latency",
6185  "kscl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_INTERESTING);
6186  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_kv_final_lat, "kv_final_lat",
6187  "Average kv_finalize thread latency",
6188  "kfll", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_INTERESTING);
6189  //****************************************
6190 
6191  // write op stats
6192  //****************************************
6193  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_write_big, "write_big",
6194  "Large aligned writes into fresh blobs");
6195  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_write_big_bytes, "write_big_bytes",
6196  "Large aligned writes into fresh blobs (bytes)",
6197  NULL,
6198  PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_DEBUGONLY,
6199  unit_t(UNIT_BYTES));
6200  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_write_big_blobs, "write_big_blobs",
6201  "Large aligned writes into fresh blobs (blobs)");
6202  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_write_big_deferred,
6203  "write_big_deferred",
6204  "Big overwrites using deferred");
6205 
6206  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_write_small, "write_small",
6207  "Small writes into existing or sparse small blobs");
6208  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_write_small_bytes, "write_small_bytes",
6209  "Small writes into existing or sparse small blobs (bytes)",
6210  NULL,
6211  PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_DEBUGONLY,
6212  unit_t(UNIT_BYTES));
6213  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_write_small_unused,
6214  "write_small_unused",
6215  "Small writes into unused portion of existing blob");
6216  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_write_small_pre_read,
6217  "write_small_pre_read",
6218  "Small writes that required we read some data (possibly "
6219  "cached) to fill out the block");
6220 
6221  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_write_pad_bytes, "write_pad_bytes",
6222  "Sum for write-op padded bytes",
6223  NULL,
6224  PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_DEBUGONLY,
6225  unit_t(UNIT_BYTES));
6226  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_write_penalty_read_ops, "write_penalty_read_ops",
6227  "Sum for write penalty read ops");
6228  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_write_new, "write_new",
6229  "Write into new blob");
6230 
6231  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_issued_deferred_writes,
6232  "issued_deferred_writes",
6233  "Total deferred writes issued");
6234  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_issued_deferred_write_bytes,
6235  "issued_deferred_write_bytes",
6236  "Total bytes in issued deferred writes",
6237  NULL,
6238  PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_DEBUGONLY,
6239  unit_t(UNIT_BYTES));
6240  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_submitted_deferred_writes,
6241  "submitted_deferred_writes",
6242  "Total deferred writes submitted to disk");
6243  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_submitted_deferred_write_bytes,
6244  "submitted_deferred_write_bytes",
6245  "Total bytes submitted to disk by deferred writes",
6246  NULL,
6247  PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_DEBUGONLY,
6248  unit_t(UNIT_BYTES));
6249 
6250  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_write_big_skipped_blobs,
6251  "write_big_skipped_blobs",
6252  "Large aligned writes into fresh blobs skipped due to zero detection (blobs)");
6253  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_write_big_skipped_bytes,
6254  "write_big_skipped_bytes",
6255  "Large aligned writes into fresh blobs skipped due to zero detection (bytes)");
6256  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_write_small_skipped,
6257  "write_small_skipped",
6258  "Small writes into existing or sparse small blobs skipped due to zero detection");
6259  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_write_small_skipped_bytes,
6260  "write_small_skipped_bytes",
6261  "Small writes into existing or sparse small blobs skipped due to zero detection (bytes)");
6262  //****************************************
6263 
6264  // compressions stats
6265  //****************************************
6266  b.add_u64(l_bluestore_compressed, "compressed",
6267  "Sum for stored compressed bytes",
6268  "c", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL, unit_t(UNIT_BYTES));
6269  b.add_u64(l_bluestore_compressed_allocated, "compressed_allocated",
6270  "Sum for bytes allocated for compressed data",
6271  "c_a", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL, unit_t(UNIT_BYTES));
6272  b.add_u64(l_bluestore_compressed_original, "compressed_original",
6273  "Sum for original bytes that were compressed",
6274  "c_o", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL, unit_t(UNIT_BYTES));
6275  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_compress_lat, "compress_lat",
6276  "Average compress latency",
6277  "_cpl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6278  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_decompress_lat, "decompress_lat",
6279  "Average decompress latency",
6280  "dcpl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6281  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_compress_success_count, "compress_success_count",
6282  "Sum for beneficial compress ops");
6283  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_compress_rejected_count, "compress_rejected_count",
6284  "Sum for compress ops rejected due to low net gain of space");
6285  //****************************************
6286 
6287  // onode cache stats
6288  //****************************************
6289  b.add_u64(l_bluestore_onodes, "onodes",
6290  "Number of onodes in cache");
6291  b.add_u64(l_bluestore_pinned_onodes, "onodes_pinned",
6292  "Number of pinned onodes in cache");
6293  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_onode_hits, "onode_hits",
6294  "Count of onode cache lookup hits",
6295  "o_ht", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6296  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_onode_misses, "onode_misses",
6297  "Count of onode cache lookup misses",
6298  "o_ms", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6299  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_onode_shard_hits, "onode_shard_hits",
6300  "Count of onode shard cache lookups hits");
6301  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_onode_shard_misses,
6302  "onode_shard_misses",
6303  "Count of onode shard cache lookups misses");
6304  b.add_u64(l_bluestore_extents, "onode_extents",
6305  "Number of extents in cache");
6306  b.add_u64(l_bluestore_blobs, "onode_blobs",
6307  "Number of blobs in cache");
6308  //****************************************
6309 
6310  // buffer cache stats
6311  //****************************************
6312  b.add_u64(l_bluestore_buffers, "buffers",
6313  "Number of buffers in cache");
6314  b.add_u64(l_bluestore_buffer_bytes, "buffer_bytes",
6315  "Number of buffer bytes in cache",
6316  NULL,
6317  PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_DEBUGONLY,
6318  unit_t(UNIT_BYTES));
6319  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_buffer_hit_bytes, "buffer_hit_bytes",
6320  "Sum for bytes of read hit in the cache",
6321  NULL,
6322  PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_DEBUGONLY,
6323  unit_t(UNIT_BYTES));
6324  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_buffer_miss_bytes, "buffer_miss_bytes",
6325  "Sum for bytes of read missed in the cache",
6326  NULL,
6327  PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_DEBUGONLY,
6328  unit_t(UNIT_BYTES));
6329  //****************************************
6330 
6331  // internal stats
6332  //****************************************
6333  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_onode_reshard, "onode_reshard",
6334  "Onode extent map reshard events");
6335  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_blob_split, "blob_split",
6336  "Sum for blob splitting due to resharding");
6337  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_extent_compress, "extent_compress",
6338  "Sum for extents that have been removed due to compression");
6339  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_gc_merged, "gc_merged",
6340  "Sum for extents that have been merged due to garbage "
6341  "collection");
6342  //****************************************
6343  // misc
6344  //****************************************
6345  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_omap_iterator_count, "omap_iterator_count",
6346  "Open omap iterators count");
6347  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_omap_rmkeys_count, "omap_rmkeys_count",
6348  "amount of omap keys removed via rmkeys");
6349  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_omap_rmkey_ranges_count, "omap_rmkey_range_count",
6350  "amount of omap key ranges removed via rmkeys");
6351  //****************************************
6352  // other client ops latencies
6353  //****************************************
6354  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_omap_seek_to_first_lat, "omap_seek_to_first_lat",
6355  "Average omap iterator seek_to_first call latency",
6356  "osfl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6357  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_omap_upper_bound_lat, "omap_upper_bound_lat",
6358  "Average omap iterator upper_bound call latency",
6359  "oubl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6360  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_omap_lower_bound_lat, "omap_lower_bound_lat",
6361  "Average omap iterator lower_bound call latency",
6362  "olbl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6363  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_omap_next_lat, "omap_next_lat",
6364  "Average omap iterator next call latency",
6365  "onxl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6366  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_omap_get_keys_lat, "omap_get_keys_lat",
6367  "Average omap get_keys call latency",
6368  "ogkl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6369  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_omap_get_values_lat, "omap_get_values_lat",
6370  "Average omap get_values call latency",
6371  "ogvl", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6372  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_omap_clear_lat, "omap_clear_lat",
6373  "Average omap clear call latency");
6374  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_clist_lat, "clist_lat",
6375  "Average collection listing latency",
6376  "cl_l", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6377  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_remove_lat, "remove_lat",
6378  "Average removal latency",
6379  "rm_l", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6380  b.add_time_avg(l_bluestore_truncate_lat, "truncate_lat",
6381  "Average truncate latency",
6382  "tr_l", PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6383  //****************************************
6384 
6385  // slow op count
6386  //****************************************
6387  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_slow_aio_wait_count,
6388  "slow_aio_wait_count",
6389  "Slow op count for aio wait",
6390  "sawc",
6391  PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6392  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_slow_committed_kv_count,
6393  "slow_committed_kv_count",
6394  "Slow op count for committed kv",
6395  "sckc",
6396  PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6397  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_slow_read_onode_meta_count,
6398  "slow_read_onode_meta_count",
6399  "Slow op count for read onode meta",
6400  "sroc",
6401  PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6402  b.add_u64_counter(l_bluestore_slow_read_wait_aio_count,
6403  "slow_read_wait_aio_count",
6404  "Slow op count for read wait aio",
6405  "srwc",
6406  PerfCountersBuilder::PRIO_USEFUL);
6407 
6408  // Resulting size axis configuration for op histograms, values are in bytes
6409  PerfHistogramCommon::axis_config_d alloc_hist_x_axis_config{
6410  "Given size (bytes)",
6411  PerfHistogramCommon::SCALE_LOG2,
6412  0,
6413  4096,
6414  13,
6415  };
6416  // Req size axis configuration for op histograms, values are in bytes
6417  PerfHistogramCommon::axis_config_d alloc_hist_y_axis_config{
6418  "Request size (bytes)",
6419  PerfHistogramCommon::SCALE_LOG2,
6420  0,
6421  4096,
6422  13,
6423  };
6424  b.add_u64_counter_histogram(
6425  l_bluestore_allocate_hist, "allocate_histogram",
6426  alloc_hist_x_axis_config, alloc_hist_y_axis_config,
6427  "Histogram of requested block allocations vs. given ones");
6428 
6429  logger = b.create_perf_counters();
6430  cct->get_perfcounters_collection()->add(logger);
6431 }
6432 
6433 int BlueStore::_reload_logger()
6434 {
6435  struct store_statfs_t store_statfs;
6436  int r = statfs(&store_statfs);
6437  if (r >= 0) {
6438  logger->set(l_bluestore_allocated, store_statfs.allocated);
6439  logger->set(l_bluestore_stored, store_statfs.data_stored);
6440  logger->set(l_bluestore_compressed, store_statfs.data_compressed);
6441  logger->set(l_bluestore_compressed_allocated, store_statfs.data_compressed_allocated);
6442  logger->set(l_bluestore_compressed_original, store_statfs.data_compressed_original);
6443  }
6444  return r;
6445 }
6446 
6447 void BlueStore::_shutdown_logger()
6448 {
6449  cct->get_perfcounters_collection()->remove(logger);
6450  delete logger;
6451 }
6452 
6453 int BlueStore::get_block_device_fsid(CephContext* cct, const string& path,
6454  uuid_d *fsid)
6455 {
6456  bluestore_bdev_label_t label;
6457  int r = _read_bdev_label(cct, path, &label);
6458  if (r < 0)
6459  return r;
6460  *fsid = label.osd_uuid;
6461  return 0;
6462 }
6463 
6464 int BlueStore::_open_path()
6465 {
6466  // sanity check(s)
6467  ceph_assert(path_fd < 0);
6468  path_fd = TEMP_FAILURE_RETRY(::open(path.c_str(), O_DIRECTORY|O_CLOEXEC));
6469  if (path_fd < 0) {
6470  int r = -errno;
6471  derr << __func__ << " unable to open " << path << ": " << cpp_strerror(r)
6472  << dendl;
6473  return r;
6474  }
6475  return 0;
6476 }
6477 
6478 void BlueStore::_close_path()
6479 {
6480  VOID_TEMP_FAILURE_RETRY(::close(path_fd));
6481  path_fd = -1;
6482 }
6483 
6484 int BlueStore::_write_bdev_label(CephContext *cct,
6485  const string &path, bluestore_bdev_label_t label)
6486 {
6487  dout(10) << __func__ << " path " << path << " label " << label << dendl;
6488  bufferlist bl;
6489  encode(label, bl);
6490  uint32_t crc = bl.crc32c(-1);
6491  encode(crc, bl);
6492  ceph_assert(bl.length() <= BDEV_LABEL_BLOCK_SIZE);
6493  bufferptr z(BDEV_LABEL_BLOCK_SIZE - bl.length());
6494  z.zero();
6495  bl.append(std::move(z));
6496 
6497  int fd = TEMP_FAILURE_RETRY(::open(path.c_str(), O_WRONLY|O_CLOEXEC|O_DIRECT));
6498  if (fd < 0) {
6499  fd = -errno;
6500  derr << __func__ << " failed to open " << path << ": " << cpp_strerror(fd)
6501  << dendl;
6502  return fd;
6503  }
6504  bl.rebuild_aligned_size_and_memory(BDEV_LABEL_BLOCK_SIZE, BDEV_LABEL_BLOCK_SIZE, IOV_MAX);
6505  int r = bl.write_fd(fd);
6506  if (r < 0) {
6507  derr << __func__ << " failed to write to " << path
6508  << ": " << cpp_strerror(r) << dendl;
6509  goto out;
6510  }
6511  r = ::fsync(fd);
6512  if (r < 0) {
6513  derr << __func__ << " failed to fsync " << path
6514  << ": " << cpp_strerror(r) << dendl;
6515  }
6516 out:
6517  VOID_TEMP_FAILURE_RETRY(::close(fd));
6518  return r;
6519 }
6520 
6521 int BlueStore::_read_bdev_label(CephContext* cct, const string &path,
6522  bluestore_bdev_label_t *label)
6523 {
6524  dout(10) << __func__ << dendl;
6525  int fd = TEMP_FAILURE_RETRY(::open(path.c_str(), O_RDONLY|O_CLOEXEC));
6526  if (fd < 0) {
6527  fd = -errno;
6528  derr << __func__ << " failed to open " << path << ": " << cpp_strerror(fd)
6529  << dendl;
6530  return fd;
6531  }
6532  bufferlist bl;
6533  int r = bl.read_fd(fd, BDEV_LABEL_BLOCK_SIZE);
6534  VOID_TEMP_FAILURE_RETRY(::close(fd));
6535  if (r < 0) {
6536  derr << __func__ << " failed to read from " << path
6537  << ": " << cpp_strerror(r) << dendl;
6538  return r;
6539  }
6540 
6541  uint32_t crc, expected_crc;
6542  auto p = bl.cbegin();
6543  try {
6544  decode(*label, p);
6545  bufferlist t;
6546  t.substr_of(bl, 0, p.get_off());
6547  crc = t.crc32c(-1);
6548  decode(expected_crc, p);
6549  }
6550  catch (ceph::buffer::error& e) {
6551  derr << __func__ << " unable to decode label " << path.c_str()
6552  << " at offset " << p.get_off()
6553  << ": " << e.what()
6554  << dendl;
6555  return -ENOENT;
6556  }
6557  if (crc != expected_crc) {
6558  derr << __func__ << " bad crc on label, expected " << expected_crc
6559  << " != actual " << crc << dendl;
6560  return -EIO;
6561  }
6562  dout(10) << __func__ << " got " << *label << dendl;
6563  return 0;
6564 }
6565 
6566 int BlueStore::_check_or_set_bdev_label(
6567  string path, uint64_t size, string desc, bool create)
6568 {
6569  bluestore_bdev_label_t label;
6570  if (create) {
6571  label.osd_uuid = fsid;
6572  label.size = size;
6573  label.btime = ceph_clock_now();
6574  label.description = desc;
6575  int r = _write_bdev_label(cct, path, label);
6576  if (r < 0)
6577  return r;
6578  } else {
6579  int r = _read_bdev_label(cct, path, &label);
6580  if (r < 0)
6581  return r;
6582  if (cct->_conf->bluestore_debug_permit_any_bdev_label) {
6583  dout(20) << __func__ << " bdev " << path << " fsid " << label.osd_uuid
6584  << " and fsid " << fsid << " check bypassed" << dendl;
6585  } else if (label.osd_uuid != fsid) {
6586  derr << __func__ << " bdev " << path << " fsid " << label.osd_uuid
6587  << " does not match our fsid " << fsid << dendl;
6588  return -EIO;
6589  }
6590  }
6591  return 0;
6592 }
6593 
6594 void BlueStore::_set_alloc_sizes(void)
6595 {
6596  max_alloc_size = cct->_conf->bluestore_max_alloc_size;
6597 
6598 #ifdef HAVE_LIBZBD
6599  ceph_assert(bdev);
6600  if (bdev->is_smr()) {
6601  prefer_deferred_size = 0;
6602  } else
6603 #endif
6604  if (cct->_conf->bluestore_prefer_deferred_size) {
6605  prefer_deferred_size = cct->_conf->bluestore_prefer_deferred_size;
6606  } else {
6607  if (_use_rotational_settings()) {
6608  prefer_deferred_size = cct->_conf->bluestore_prefer_deferred_size_hdd;
6609  } else {
6610  prefer_deferred_size = cct->_conf->bluestore_prefer_deferred_size_ssd;
6611  }
6612  }
6613 
6614  if (cct->_conf->bluestore_deferred_batch_ops) {
6615  deferred_batch_ops = cct->_conf->bluestore_deferred_batch_ops;
6616  } else {
6617  if (_use_rotational_settings()) {
6618  deferred_batch_ops = cct->_conf->bluestore_deferred_batch_ops_hdd;
6619  } else {
6620  deferred_batch_ops = cct->_conf->bluestore_deferred_batch_ops_ssd;
6621  }
6622  }
6623 
6624  dout(10) << __func__ << " min_alloc_size 0x" << std::hex << min_alloc_size
6625  << std::dec << " order " << (int)min_alloc_size_order
6626  << " max_alloc_size 0x" << std::hex << max_alloc_size
6627  << " prefer_deferred_size 0x" << prefer_deferred_size
6628  << std::dec
6629  << " deferred_batch_ops " << deferred_batch_ops
6630  << dendl;
6631 }
6632 
6633 int BlueStore::_open_bdev(bool create)
6634 {
6635  ceph_assert(bdev == NULL);
6636  string p = path + "/block";
6637  bdev = BlockDevice::create(cct, p, aio_cb, static_cast<void*>(this), discard_cb, static_cast<void*>(this));
6638  int r = bdev->open(p);
6639  if (r < 0)
6640  goto fail;
6641 
6642  if (create && cct->_conf->bdev_enable_discard) {
6643  interval_set<uint64_t> whole_device;
6644  whole_device.insert(0, bdev->get_size());
6645  bdev->try_discard(whole_device, false);
6646  }
6647 
6648  if (bdev->supported_bdev_label()) {
6649  r = _check_or_set_bdev_label(p, bdev->get_size(), "main", create);
6650  if (r < 0)
6651  goto fail_close;
6652  }
6653 
6654  // initialize global block parameters
6655  block_size = bdev->get_block_size();
6656  block_mask = ~(block_size - 1);
6657  block_size_order = std::countr_zero(block_size);
6658  ceph_assert(block_size == 1u << block_size_order);
6659  _set_max_defer_interval();
6660  // and set cache_size based on device type
6661  r = _set_cache_sizes();
6662  if (r < 0) {
6663  goto fail_close;
6664  }
6665  // get block dev optimal io size
6666  optimal_io_size = bdev->get_optimal_io_size();
6667 
6668  return 0;
6669 
6670  fail_close:
6671  bdev->close();
6672  fail:
6673  delete bdev;
6674  bdev = NULL;
6675  return r;
6676 }
6677 
6678 void BlueStore::_validate_bdev()
6679 {
6680  ceph_assert(bdev);
6681  uint64_t dev_size = bdev->get_size();
6682  ceph_assert(dev_size > _get_ondisk_reserved());
6683 }
6684 
6685 void BlueStore::_close_bdev()
6686 {
6687  ceph_assert(bdev);
6688  bdev->close();
6689  delete bdev;
6690  bdev = NULL;
6691 }
6692 
6693 int BlueStore::_open_fm(KeyValueDB::Transaction t,
6694  bool read_only,
6695  bool db_avail,
6696  bool fm_restore)
6697 {
6698  int r;
6699 
6700  dout(5) << __func__ << "::NCB::freelist_type=" << freelist_type << dendl;
6701  ceph_assert(fm == NULL);
6702  // fm_restore means we are transitioning from null-fm to bitmap-fm
6703  ceph_assert(!fm_restore || (freelist_type != "null"));
6704  // fm restore must pass in a valid transaction
6705  ceph_assert(!fm_restore || (t != nullptr));
6706 
6707  // when function is called in repair mode (to_repair=true) we skip db->open()/create()
6708  bool can_have_null_fm = !is_db_rotational() &&
6709  !read_only &&
6710  db_avail &&
6711  cct->_conf->bluestore_allocation_from_file &&
6712  !bdev->is_smr();
6713 
6714  // When allocation-info is stored in a single file we set freelist_type to "null"
6715  if (can_have_null_fm) {
6716  freelist_type = "null";
6717  need_to_destage_allocation_file = true;
6718  }
6719  fm = FreelistManager::create(cct, freelist_type, PREFIX_ALLOC);
6720  ceph_assert(fm);
6721  if (t) {
6722  // create mode. initialize freespace
6723  dout(20) << __func__ << " initializing freespace" << dendl;
6724  {
6725  bufferlist bl;
6726  bl.append(freelist_type);
6727  t->set(PREFIX_SUPER, "freelist_type", bl);
6728  }
6729  // being able to allocate in units less than bdev block size
6730  // seems to be a bad idea.
6731  ceph_assert(cct->_conf->bdev_block_size <= min_alloc_size);
6732 
6733  uint64_t alloc_size = min_alloc_size;
6734  if (bdev->is_smr() && freelist_type != "zoned") {
6735  derr << "SMR device but freelist_type = " << freelist_type << " (not zoned)"
6736  << dendl;
6737  return -EINVAL;
6738  }
6739  if (!bdev->is_smr() && freelist_type == "zoned") {
6740  derr << "non-SMR device (or SMR support not built-in) but freelist_type = zoned"
6741  << dendl;
6742  return -EINVAL;
6743  }
6744 
6745  fm->create(bdev->get_size(), alloc_size,
6746  zone_size, first_sequential_zone,
6747  t);
6748 
6749  // allocate superblock reserved space. note that we do not mark
6750  // bluefs space as allocated in the freelist; we instead rely on
6751  // bluefs doing that itself.
6752  auto reserved = _get_ondisk_reserved();
6753  if (fm_restore) {
6754  // we need to allocate the full space in restore case
6755  // as later we will add free-space marked in the allocator file
6756  fm->allocate(0, bdev->get_size(), t);
6757  } else {
6758  // allocate superblock reserved space. note that we do not mark
6759  // bluefs space as allocated in the freelist; we instead rely on
6760  // bluefs doing that itself.
6761  fm->allocate(0, reserved, t);
6762  }
6763  // debug code - not needed for NULL FM
6764  if (cct->_conf->bluestore_debug_prefill > 0) {
6765  uint64_t end = bdev->get_size() - reserved;
6766  dout(1) << __func__ << " pre-fragmenting freespace, using "
6767  << cct->_conf->bluestore_debug_prefill << " with max free extent "
6768  << cct->_conf->bluestore_debug_prefragment_max << dendl;
6769  uint64_t start = p2roundup(reserved, min_alloc_size);
6770  uint64_t max_b = cct->_conf->bluestore_debug_prefragment_max / min_alloc_size;
6771  float r = cct->_conf->bluestore_debug_prefill;
6772  r /= 1.0 - r;
6773  bool stop = false;
6774 
6775  while (!stop && start < end) {
6776  uint64_t l = (rand() % max_b + 1) * min_alloc_size;
6777  if (start + l > end) {
6778  l = end - start;
6779  l = p2align(l, min_alloc_size);
6780  }
6781  ceph_assert(start + l <= end);
6782 
6783  uint64_t u = 1 + (uint64_t)(r * (double)l);
6784  u = p2roundup(u, min_alloc_size);
6785  if (start + l + u > end) {
6786  u = end - (start + l);
6787  // trim to align so we don't overflow again
6788  u = p2align(u, min_alloc_size);
6789  stop = true;
6790  }
6791  ceph_assert(start + l + u <= end);
6792 
6793  dout(20) << __func__ << " free 0x" << std::hex << start << "~" << l
6794  << " use 0x" << u << std::dec << dendl;
6795 
6796  if (u == 0) {
6797  // break if u has been trimmed to nothing
6798  break;
6799  }
6800 
6801  fm->allocate(start + l, u, t);
6802  start += l + u;
6803  }
6804  }
6805  r = _write_out_fm_meta(0);
6806  ceph_assert(r == 0);
6807  } else {
6808  if (can_have_null_fm) {
6809  commit_to_null_manager();
6810  }
6811  r = fm->init(db, read_only,
6812  [&](const std::string& key, std::string* result) {
6813  return read_meta(key, result);
6814  });
6815  if (r < 0) {
6816  derr << __func__ << " failed: " << cpp_strerror(r) << dendl;
6817  delete fm;
6818  fm = NULL;
6819  return r;
6820  }
6821  }
6822  // if space size tracked by free list manager is that higher than actual
6823  // dev size one can hit out-of-space allocation which will result
6824  // in data loss and/or assertions
6825  // Probably user altered the device size somehow.
6826  // The only fix for now is to redeploy OSD.
6827  if (fm->get_size() >= bdev->get_size() + min_alloc_size) {
6828  ostringstream ss;
6829  ss << "slow device size mismatch detected, "
6830  << " fm size(" << fm->get_size()
6831  << ") > slow device size(" << bdev->get_size()
6832  << "), Please stop using this OSD as it might cause data loss.";
6833  _set_disk_size_mismatch_alert(ss.str());
6834  }
6835  return 0;
6836 }
6837 
6838 void BlueStore::_close_fm()
6839 {
6840  dout(10) << __func__ << dendl;
6841  ceph_assert(fm);
6842  fm->shutdown();
6843  delete fm;
6844  fm = NULL;
6845 }
6846 
6847 int BlueStore::_write_out_fm_meta(uint64_t target_size)
6848 {
6849  int r = 0;
6850  string p = path + "/block";
6851 
6852  std::vector<std::pair<string, string>> fm_meta;
6853  fm->get_meta(target_size, &fm_meta);
6854 
6855  for (auto& m : fm_meta) {
6856  r = write_meta(m.first, m.second);
6857  ceph_assert(r == 0);
6858  }
6859  return r;
6860 }
6861 
6862 int BlueStore::_create_alloc()
6863 {
6864  ceph_assert(alloc == NULL);
6865  ceph_assert(shared_alloc.a == NULL);
6866  ceph_assert(bdev->get_size());
6867 
6868  uint64_t alloc_size = min_alloc_size;
6869 
6870  std::string allocator_type = cct->_conf->bluestore_allocator;
6871 
6872 #ifdef HAVE_LIBZBD
6873  if (freelist_type == "zoned") {
6874  allocator_type = "zoned";
6875  }
6876 #endif
6877 
6878  alloc = Allocator::create(
6879  cct, allocator_type,
6880  bdev->get_size(),
6881  alloc_size,
6882  zone_size,
6883  first_sequential_zone,
6884  "block");
6885  if (!alloc) {
6886  lderr(cct) << __func__ << " failed to create " << allocator_type << " allocator"
6887  << dendl;
6888  return -EINVAL;
6889  }
6890 
6891 #ifdef HAVE_LIBZBD
6892  if (freelist_type == "zoned") {
6893  Allocator *a = Allocator::create(
6894  cct, cct->_conf->bluestore_allocator,
6895  bdev->get_conventional_region_size(),
6896  alloc_size,
6897  zone_size, 0,
6898  "zoned_block");
6899  if (!a) {
6900  lderr(cct) << __func__ << " failed to create " << cct->_conf->bluestore_allocator
6901  << " allocator" << dendl;
6902  delete alloc;
6903  return -EINVAL;
6904  }
6905  shared_alloc.set(a, alloc_size);
6906  } else
6907 #endif
6908  {
6909  // BlueFS will share the same allocator
6910  shared_alloc.set(alloc, alloc_size);
6911  }
6912 
6913  return 0;
6914 }
6915 
6916 int BlueStore::_init_alloc(std::map<uint64_t, uint64_t> *zone_adjustments)
6917 {
6918  int r = _create_alloc();
6919  if (r < 0) {
6920  return r;
6921  }
6922  ceph_assert(alloc != NULL);
6923 
6924 #ifdef HAVE_LIBZBD
6925  if (bdev->is_smr()) {
6926  auto a = dynamic_cast<ZonedAllocator*>(alloc);
6927  ceph_assert(a);
6928  auto f = dynamic_cast<ZonedFreelistManager*>(fm);
6929  ceph_assert(f);
6930  vector<uint64_t> wp = bdev->get_zones();
6931  vector<zone_state_t> zones = f->get_zone_states(db);
6932  ceph_assert(wp.size() == zones.size());
6933 
6934  // reconcile zone state
6935  auto num_zones = bdev->get_size() / zone_size;
6936  for (unsigned i = first_sequential_zone; i < num_zones; ++i) {
6937  ceph_assert(wp[i] >= i * zone_size);
6938  ceph_assert(wp[i] <= (i + 1) * zone_size); // pos might be at start of next zone
6939  uint64_t p = wp[i] - i * zone_size;
6940  if (zones[i].write_pointer > p) {
6941  derr << __func__ << " zone 0x" << std::hex << i
6942  << " bluestore write pointer 0x" << zones[i].write_pointer
6943  << " > device write pointer 0x" << p
6944  << std::dec << " -- VERY SUSPICIOUS!" << dendl;
6945  } else if (zones[i].write_pointer < p) {
6946  // this is "normal" in that it can happen after any crash (if we have a
6947  // write in flight but did not manage to commit the transaction)
6948  auto delta = p - zones[i].write_pointer;
6949  dout(1) << __func__ << " zone 0x" << std::hex << i
6950  << " device write pointer 0x" << p
6951  << " > bluestore pointer 0x" << zones[i].write_pointer
6952  << ", advancing 0x" << delta << std::dec << dendl;
6953  (*zone_adjustments)[zones[i].write_pointer] = delta;
6954  zones[i].num_dead_bytes += delta;
6955  zones[i].write_pointer = p;
6956  }
6957  }
6958 
6959  // start with conventional zone "free" (bluefs may adjust this when it starts up)
6960  auto reserved = _get_ondisk_reserved();
6961  // for now we require a conventional zone
6962  ceph_assert(bdev->get_conventional_region_size());
6963  ceph_assert(shared_alloc.a != alloc); // zoned allocator doesn't use conventional region
6964  shared_alloc.a->init_add_free(
6965  reserved,
6966  p2align(bdev->get_conventional_region_size(), min_alloc_size) - reserved);
6967 
6968  // init sequential zone based on the device's write pointers
6969  a->init_from_zone_pointers(std::move(zones));
6970  dout(1) << __func__
6971  << " loaded zone pointers: "
6972  << std::hex
6973  << ", allocator type " << alloc->get_type()
6974  << ", capacity 0x" << alloc->get_capacity()
6975  << ", block size 0x" << alloc->get_block_size()
6976  << ", free 0x" << alloc->get_free()
6977  << ", fragmentation " << alloc->get_fragmentation()
6978  << std::dec << dendl;
6979 
6980  return 0;
6981  }
6982 #endif
6983 
6984  uint64_t num = 0, bytes = 0;
6985  utime_t start_time = ceph_clock_now();
6986  if (!fm->is_null_manager()) {
6987  // This is the original path - loading allocation map from RocksDB and feeding into the allocator
6988  dout(5) << __func__ << "::NCB::loading allocation from FM -> alloc" << dendl;
6989  // initialize from freelist
6990  fm->enumerate_reset();
6991  uint64_t offset, length;
6992  while (fm->enumerate_next(db, &offset, &length)) {
6993  alloc->init_add_free(offset, length);
6994  ++num;
6995  bytes += length;
6996  }
6997  fm->enumerate_reset();
6998 
6999  utime_t duration = ceph_clock_now() - start_time;
7000  dout(5) << __func__ << "::num_entries=" << num << " free_size=" << bytes << " alloc_size=" <<
7001  alloc->get_capacity() - bytes << " time=" << duration << " seconds" << dendl;
7002  } else {
7003  // This is the new path reading the allocation map from a flat bluefs file and feeding them into the allocator
7004 
7005  if (!cct->_conf->bluestore_allocation_from_file) {
7006  derr << __func__ << "::NCB::cct->_conf->bluestore_allocation_from_file is set to FALSE with an active NULL-FM" << dendl;
7007  derr << __func__ << "::NCB::Please change the value of bluestore_allocation_from_file to TRUE in your ceph.conf file" << dendl;
7008  return -ENOTSUP; // Operation not supported
7009  }
7010  if (restore_allocator(alloc, &num, &bytes) == 0) {
7011  dout(5) << __func__ << "::NCB::restore_allocator() completed successfully alloc=" << alloc << dendl;
7012  } else {
7013  // This must mean that we had an unplanned shutdown and didn't manage to destage the allocator
7014  dout(0) << __func__ << "::NCB::restore_allocator() failed! Run Full Recovery from ONodes (might take a while) ..." << dendl;
7015  // if failed must recover from on-disk ONode internal state
7016  if (read_allocation_from_drive_on_startup() != 0) {
7017  derr << __func__ << "::NCB::Failed Recovery" << dendl;
7018  derr << __func__ << "::NCB::Ceph-OSD won't start, make sure your drives are connected and readable" << dendl;
7019  derr << __func__ << "::NCB::If no HW fault is found, please report failure and consider redeploying OSD" << dendl;
7020  return -ENOTRECOVERABLE;
7021  }
7022  }
7023  }
7024  dout(1) << __func__
7025  << " loaded " << byte_u_t(bytes) << " in " << num << " extents"
7026  << std::hex
7027  << ", allocator type " << alloc->get_type()
7028  << ", capacity 0x" << alloc->get_capacity()
7029  << ", block size 0x" << alloc->get_block_size()
7030  << ", free 0x" << alloc->get_free()
7031  << ", fragmentation " << alloc->get_fragmentation()
7032  << std::dec << dendl;
7033 
7034  return 0;
7035 }
7036 
7037 void BlueStore::_post_init_alloc(const std::map<uint64_t, uint64_t>& zone_adjustments)
7038 {
7039  int r = 0;
7040 #ifdef HAVE_LIBZBD
7041  if (bdev->is_smr()) {
7042  if (zone_adjustments.empty()) {
7043  return;
7044  }
7045  dout(1) << __func__ << " adjusting freelist based on device write pointers" << dendl;
7046  auto f = dynamic_cast<ZonedFreelistManager*>(fm);
7047  ceph_assert(f);
7048  KeyValueDB::Transaction t = db->get_transaction();
7049  for (auto& i : zone_adjustments) {
7050  // allocate AND release since this gap is now dead space
7051  // note that the offset is imprecise, but only need to select the zone
7052  f->allocate(i.first, i.second, t);
7053  f->release(i.first, i.second, t);
7054  }
7055  r = db->submit_transaction_sync(t);
7056  } else
7057 #endif
7058  if (fm->is_null_manager()) {
7059  // Now that we load the allocation map we need to invalidate the file as new allocation won't be reflected
7060  // Changes to the allocation map (alloc/release) are not updated inline and will only be stored on umount()
7061  // This means that we should not use the existing file on failure case (unplanned shutdown) and must resort
7062  // to recovery from RocksDB::ONodes
7063  r = invalidate_allocation_file_on_bluefs();
7064  }
7065  ceph_assert(r >= 0);
7066 }
7067 
7068 void BlueStore::_close_alloc()
7069 {
7070  ceph_assert(bdev);
7071  bdev->discard_drain();
7072 
7073  ceph_assert(alloc);
7074  alloc->shutdown();
7075  delete alloc;
7076 
7077  ceph_assert(shared_alloc.a);
7078  if (alloc != shared_alloc.a) {
7079  shared_alloc.a->shutdown();
7080  delete shared_alloc.a;
7081  }
7082 
7083  shared_alloc.reset();
7084  alloc = nullptr;
7085 }
7086 
7087 int BlueStore::_open_fsid(bool create)
7088 {
7089  ceph_assert(fsid_fd < 0);
7090  int flags = O_RDWR|O_CLOEXEC;
7091  if (create)
7092  flags |= O_CREAT;
7093  fsid_fd = ::openat(path_fd, "fsid", flags, 0644);
7094  if (fsid_fd < 0) {
7095  int err = -errno;
7096  derr << __func__ << " " << cpp_strerror(err) << dendl;
7097  return err;
7098  }
7099  return 0;
7100 }
7101 
7102 int BlueStore::_read_fsid(uuid_d *uuid)
7103 {
7104  char fsid_str[40];
7105  memset(fsid_str, 0, sizeof(fsid_str));
7106  int ret = safe_read(fsid_fd, fsid_str, sizeof(fsid_str));
7107  if (ret < 0) {
7108  derr << __func__ << " failed: " << cpp_strerror(ret) << dendl;
7109  return ret;
7110  }
7111  if (ret > 36)
7112  fsid_str[36] = 0;
7113  else
7114  fsid_str[ret] = 0;
7115  if (!uuid->parse(fsid_str)) {
7116  derr << __func__ << " unparsable uuid " << fsid_str << dendl;
7117  return -EINVAL;
7118  }
7119  return 0;
7120 }
7121 
7122 int BlueStore::_write_fsid()
7123 {
7124  int r = ::ftruncate(fsid_fd, 0);
7125  if (r < 0) {
7126  r = -errno;
7127  derr << __func__ << " fsid truncate failed: " << cpp_strerror(r) << dendl;
7128  return r;
7129  }
7130  string str = stringify(fsid) + "\n";
7131  r = safe_write(fsid_fd, str.c_str(), str.length());
7132  if (r < 0) {
7133  derr << __func__ << " fsid write failed: " << cpp_strerror(r) << dendl;
7134  return r;
7135  }
7136  r = ::fsync(fsid_fd);
7137  if (r < 0) {
7138  r = -errno;
7139  derr << __func__ << " fsid fsync failed: " << cpp_strerror(r) << dendl;
7140  return r;
7141  }
7142  return 0;
7143 }
7144 
7145 void BlueStore::_close_fsid()
7146 {
7147  VOID_TEMP_FAILURE_RETRY(::close(fsid_fd));
7148  fsid_fd = -1;
7149 }
7150 
7151 int BlueStore::_lock_fsid()
7152 {
7153  struct flock l;
7154  memset(&l, 0, sizeof(l));
7155  l.l_type = F_WRLCK;
7156  l.l_whence = SEEK_SET;
7157  int r = ::fcntl(fsid_fd, F_SETLK, &l);
7158  if (r < 0) {
7159  int err = errno;
7160  derr << __func__ << " failed to lock " << path << "/fsid"
7161  << " (is another ceph-osd still running?)"
7162  << cpp_strerror(err) << dendl;
7163  return -err;
7164  }
7165  return 0;
7166 }
7167 
7168 bool BlueStore::is_rotational()
7169 {
7170  if (bdev) {
7171  return bdev->is_rotational();
7172  }
7173 
7174  bool rotational = true;
7175  int r = _open_path();
7176  if (r < 0)
7177  goto out;
7178  r = _open_fsid(false);
7179  if (r < 0)
7180  goto out_path;
7181  r = _read_fsid(&fsid);
7182  if (r < 0)
7183  goto out_fsid;
7184  r = _lock_fsid();
7185  if (r < 0)
7186  goto out_fsid;
7187  r = _open_bdev(false);
7188  if (r < 0)
7189  goto out_fsid;
7190  rotational = bdev->is_rotational();
7191  _close_bdev();
7192  out_fsid:
7193  _close_fsid();
7194  out_path:
7195  _close_path();
7196  out:
7197  return rotational;
7198 }
7199 
7200 bool BlueStore::is_journal_rotational()
7201 {
7202  if (!bluefs) {
7203  dout(5) << __func__ << " bluefs disabled, default to store media type"
7204  << dendl;
7205  return is_rotational();
7206  }
7207  dout(10) << __func__ << " " << (int)bluefs->wal_is_rotational() << dendl;
7208  return bluefs->wal_is_rotational();
7209 }
7210 
7211 bool BlueStore::is_db_rotational()
7212 {
7213  if (!bluefs) {
7214  dout(5) << __func__ << " bluefs disabled, default to store media type"
7215  << dendl;
7216  return is_rotational();
7217  }
7218  dout(10) << __func__ << " " << (int)bluefs->db_is_rotational() << dendl;
7219  return bluefs->db_is_rotational();
7220 }
7221 
7222 bool BlueStore::_use_rotational_settings()
7223 {
7224  if (cct->_conf->bluestore_debug_enforce_settings == "hdd") {
7225  return true;
7226  }
7227  if (cct->_conf->bluestore_debug_enforce_settings == "ssd") {
7228  return false;
7229  }
7230  return bdev->is_rotational();
7231 }
7232 
7233 bool BlueStore::is_statfs_recoverable() const
7234 {
7235  // abuse fm for now
7236  return has_null_manager();
7237 }
7238 
7239 bool BlueStore::test_mount_in_use()
7240 {
7241  // most error conditions mean the mount is not in use (e.g., because
7242  // it doesn't exist). only if we fail to lock do we conclude it is
7243  // in use.
7244  bool ret = false;
7245  int r = _open_path();
7246  if (r < 0)
7247  return false;
7248  r = _open_fsid(false);
7249  if (r < 0)
7250  goto out_path;
7251  r = _lock_fsid();
7252  if (r < 0)
7253  ret = true; // if we can't lock, it is in use
7254  _close_fsid();
7255  out_path:
7256  _close_path();
7257  return ret;
7258 }
7259 
7260 int BlueStore::_minimal_open_bluefs(bool create)
7261 {
7262  int r;
7263  bluefs = new BlueFS(cct);
7264 
7265  string bfn;
7266  struct stat st;
7267 
7268  bfn = path + "/block.db";
7269  if (::stat(bfn.c_str(), &st) == 0) {
7270  r = bluefs->add_block_device(
7271  BlueFS::BDEV_DB, bfn,
7272  create && cct->_conf->bdev_enable_discard);
7273  if (r < 0) {
7274  derr << __func__ << " add block device(" << bfn << ") returned: "
7275  << cpp_strerror(r) << dendl;
7276  goto free_bluefs;
7277  }
7278 
7279  if (bluefs->bdev_support_label(BlueFS::BDEV_DB)) {
7280  r = _check_or_set_bdev_label(
7281  bfn,
7282  bluefs->get_block_device_size(BlueFS::BDEV_DB),
7283  "bluefs db", create);
7284  if (r < 0) {
7285  derr << __func__
7286  << " check block device(" << bfn << ") label returned: "
7287  << cpp_strerror(r) << dendl;
7288  goto free_bluefs;
7289  }
7290  }
7291  bluefs_layout.shared_bdev = BlueFS::BDEV_SLOW;
7292  bluefs_layout.dedicated_db = true;
7293  } else {
7294  r = -errno;
7295  if (::lstat(bfn.c_str(), &st) == -1) {
7296  r = 0;
7297  bluefs_layout.shared_bdev = BlueFS::BDEV_DB;
7298  } else {
7299  derr << __func__ << " " << bfn << " symlink exists but target unusable: "
7300  << cpp_strerror(r) << dendl;
7301  goto free_bluefs;
7302  }
7303  }
7304 
7305  // shared device
7306  bfn = path + "/block";
7307  // never trim here
7308  r = bluefs->add_block_device(bluefs_layout.shared_bdev, bfn, false,
7309  &shared_alloc);
7310  if (r < 0) {
7311  derr << __func__ << " add block device(" << bfn << ") returned: "
7312  << cpp_strerror(r) << dendl;
7313  goto free_bluefs;
7314  }
7315 
7316  bfn = path + "/block.wal";
7317  if (::stat(bfn.c_str(), &st) == 0) {
7318  r = bluefs->add_block_device(BlueFS::BDEV_WAL, bfn,
7319  create && cct->_conf->bdev_enable_discard);
7320  if (r < 0) {
7321  derr << __func__ << " add block device(" << bfn << ") returned: "
7322  << cpp_strerror(r) << dendl;
7323  goto free_bluefs;
7324  }
7325 
7326  if (bluefs->bdev_support_label(BlueFS::BDEV_WAL)) {
7327  r = _check_or_set_bdev_label(
7328  bfn,
7329  bluefs->get_block_device_size(BlueFS::BDEV_WAL),
7330  "bluefs wal", create);
7331  if (r < 0) {
7332  derr << __func__ << " check block device(" << bfn
7333  << ") label returned: " << cpp_strerror(r) << dendl;
7334  goto free_bluefs;
7335  }
7336  }
7337 
7338  bluefs_layout.dedicated_wal = true;
7339  } else {
7340  r = 0;
7341  if (::lstat(bfn.c_str(), &st) != -1) {
7342  r = -errno;
7343  derr << __func__ << " " << bfn << " symlink exists but target unusable: "
7344  << cpp_strerror(r) << dendl;
7345  goto free_bluefs;
7346  }
7347  }
7348  return 0;
7349 
7350 free_bluefs:
7351  ceph_assert(bluefs);
7352  delete bluefs;
7353  bluefs = NULL;
7354  return r;
7355 }
7356 
7357 int BlueStore::_open_bluefs(bool create, bool read_only)
7358 {
7359  int r = _minimal_open_bluefs(create);
7360  if (r < 0) {
7361  return r;
7362  }
7363  BlueFSVolumeSelector* vselector = nullptr;
7364  if (bluefs_layout.shared_bdev == BlueFS::BDEV_SLOW ||
7365  cct->_conf->bluestore_volume_selection_policy == "use_some_extra_enforced" ||
7366  cct->_conf->bluestore_volume_selection_policy == "fit_to_fast") {
7367 
7368  string options = cct->_conf->bluestore_rocksdb_options;
7369  string options_annex = cct->_conf->bluestore_rocksdb_options_annex;
7370  if (!options_annex.empty()) {
7371  if (!options.empty() &&
7372  *options.rbegin() != ',') {
7373  options += ',';
7374  }
7375  options += options_annex;
7376  }
7377 
7378  rocksdb::Options rocks_opts;
7379  r = RocksDBStore::ParseOptionsFromStringStatic(
7380  cct,
7381  options,
7382  rocks_opts,
7383  nullptr);
7384  if (r < 0) {
7385  return r;
7386  }
